mapper.select: select * from REPLY_DEALINFO where DEALNO = #{dealno} order by (case when REF = 0 then REPLYNO else REF end), REPLYNO
mapper.update: update REPLY_DEALINFO set CONTENT = #{content} where REPLYNO = #{replyno}
update DEALINFO set REPLYCOUNT = REPLYCOUNT + 1 where DEALNO = #{dealno}
update DEALINFO set REPLYCOUNT = REPLYCOUNT - 1 where DEALNO = (select DEALNO from REPLY_DEALINFO where REPLYNO = #{replyno})
mapper.select: select COUNT(LIKEIT) from LIKEIT_REPLY_DEALINFO where REPLYNO = #{replyno} and USERNAME = #{username}
mapper.update: update REPLY_DEALINFO set LIKEITCOUNT = LIKEITCOUNT + 1 where REPLYNO = #{replyno}
